parameters.query: SELECT mc.channel_id, mc.channel_name, mc.target_locales, mc.brand_config, yt.access_token FROM media_channels mc JOIN youtube_tokens yt ON mc.channel_id = yt.channel_id WHERE mc.is_active = TRUE AND yt.is_active = TRUE AND ($1 IS NULL OR mc.channel_id = $1) LIMIT 50

SELECT id, title, description, youtube_video_id, publish_status, category, keywords FROM media_content WHERE channel_id = $1 AND publish_status = 'published' AND youtube_video_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT 5

INSERT INTO community_posts (channel_id, post_type, content, content_language, ai_generated, ai_model, ai_confidence, status, scheduled_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'ja', $4, $5, $6, 'scheduled', NOW() + INTERVAL '1 hour') RETURNING id, post_id

SELECT ca.comment_id, ca.video_id, ca.author_name, ca.comment_text, ca.sentiment, ca.published_at FROM comment_automation ca WHERE ca.platform = 'youtube' AND ca.response_status = 'pending' AND ca.published_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC LIMIT 100
INSERT INTO sentiment_alerts (alert_type, severity, negative_ratio, negative_count, comment_count, recommended_action, status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, 'active') RETURNING id, alert_id

parameters.name: body
